name: Kazuya Mishima
description: Kazuya Mishima is a central character in the Tekken series, known for his intense rivalry with his father, Heihachi Mishima. He possesses the Devil Gene, which grants him powerful and destructive abilities.

name: King II
description: King II is a professional wrestler who follows in the footsteps of the original King. He wears a jaguar mask and is known for his powerful throws and high-flying wrestling moves. He fights to raise money for his orphanage.

name: Marshall Law
description: Marshall Law is a martial artist inspired by Bruce Lee. Known for his fast and fluid fighting style, he fights to provide for his family and to prove himself as a top fighter.

name: Lidia Sobieska
description: Lidia Sobieska is the Prime Minister of Poland and a skilled martial artist. She is a powerful fighter who uses her political influence to make positive changes while proving her strength in battle.
